param.name: build
param.label: Please select your preferred genome build from the drop down list.

param.name: hapCUT2_OUTPUT
param.label: Do you already have a hapCUT2 processed output from your somatic vcf file?

param.name: somatic_vcf
param.label: Input your somatic vcf file for processing.

param.name: germline_option
param.label: Would you like to include germline variation in the neoepitope prediction? Choosing Yes would require a germline vcf file

param.name: germline_vcf
param.label: Input your germline vcf file for processing.
